title: 87/582/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 November 1987 approving a programme submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany for the marketing of flowers and ornamental plants in Hessen pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 November 1987
approving a programme submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany for the marketing of flowers and ornamental plants in Hessen pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the German text is authentic)
(87/582/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for flowers and ornamental plants in Hessen submitted by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 3 November 1986 and supplemented on 25 June 1987 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
